Package com.dca.checkers.ui

Class OptionPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.dca.checkers.ui.OptionPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class OptionPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The OptionPanel class provides a user interface component to control options for the game of checkers being played in the window CheckersWindow.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
